text: Gérard Philippe René André Larcher (born 14 September 1949) is a French politician. He has been the President of the Senate since 2014. He was also the Senate President from 2008 to 2011. He is a member of The Republicans. He has been a Senator for the Yvelines department since 1986."Séance du 1er octobre 2008 (compte rendu intégral des débats)", Senate website . He also was Mayor of Rambouillet from 1983 to 2004 and again from 2007 until 2014. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Senate (France) Category:French mayors Category:Politicians from Normandy Category:Politicians from Île-de-France Category:People from Orne Category:People from Yvelines
title: Gérard Larcher
